predefined_profiles.name: Taro
predefined_profiles.public profile: Male, a student at Tomato High School. His grades are excellent, but due to the poor atmosphere at the school, his outstanding performance ironically becomes the reason for being bullied.
predefined_profiles.goal: To do everything he can to pursue Sakura.
predefined_profiles.private profile: He developed a crush on the school bully, Sakura, at first sight, and she is a major motivation for him to persist in this high school.

predefined_profiles.name: Sakura
predefined_profiles.public profile: Female, a well-known bully at Tomato High School, with a gentle appearance but very skilled in fighting.
predefined_profiles.goal: She hopes to become the most powerful bully in the world, so she can protect those she wants to protect.

scenario: Tomato High School, an ordinary afternoon after school, the shrubbery by the roadside echoes with sounds of fighting and yelling. Taro is curled up on the ground, shielding his head with his hands, while A Cat and A Dog are relentlessly beating and kicking him.

profile.name: Peach
profile.public profile: Female, a student at Tomato High School, sister to Cherry.
profile.goal: She hopes to always stand shoulder to shoulder with Cherry and become the formidable school boss she aspires to be.

profile.name: Melon
profile.public profile: Male, Taro's friend, a bit of a drifter but kind-hearted and occasionally gets into fights.

profile.name: Cat
profile.public profile: Male, one of the school bosses of Tomato High School.
profile.goal: To defeat the school boss of Tomato High School and dominate the Fruit District.

profile.name: Dog
profile.public profile: Male, the second school boss of Tomato High School.
profile.goal: Assist Cat in defeating the school boss of Tomato High School and dominate the Fruit District.

dialog.content: Tomato High School, an ordinary afternoon after school, but sounds of fighting and shouting came from the roadside bushes. Taro was curled up on the ground, hands protecting his head, while Cat and Dog were kicking and punching him violently.
I didn't, I didn't...
(Kicking Taro while cursing) I hate fake people like you the most!
(Heard before seen) Beating someone up on someone else's turf, shouldn't you at least report it?
Boss, who is she?
Our school, Tomato High, doesn't agree this is your turf!
(Takes out a knife) Oh?
(Charges forward) Aah— (gets knocked down to the ground by Cherry in a flash)
Let's go! Dog! (Cat and Dog flee helter-skelter)
Hmph, don't know what's good for you. Hey, you lying on the ground over there, you can leave now! (Turns to leave)
(Suddenly jumps up from the ground) Cherry!
Oh? You know who I am?

content.content: : I, I like you! I've liked you so much ever since I first saw you! Please be with me!
Cherry, did Cat and Dog just like you? Do you know how attractive you are?
Cherry, you know what? I want to create a world you'd love!
Do you know what I like? Do you know the meaning of life I'm pursuing?

question: #question# How should Taro express his feelings for Cherry?

content.content: Let me perform a dance for you!
Cherry, did you know, I can dance, can you?
Cherry, did you know? I like you so, so much!
Your bravery is like a dancing bird in spring, stealing my heart!

question: #question# How should Taro say he wants to dance?

dialog.content: Thanks for liking me, but you better keep your distance.
Why?! You just saved me!
I was just taking out the trash from my territory, that's all.
No, Sakura! (stands up and holds onto her leg) Please give me a chance!
(shakes him off) Ugh, annoying! Fine, but you have to do one thing!
What is it?!!!
You have to beat me! Otherwise, I won't acknowledge your ability!

content.content: (muttering to himself) I'm a respectable man! How can I fight with the woman I love?
Woman, you've caught my attention, and you must take responsibility for that!
Sakura, what does conquering the world matter? What I truly want is your heart!
Will beating you win your heart? Is it really that simple?

question: #question#What can Taro say to show he realizes he's a man and therefore doesn't want to fight Sakura?

content.content: If that's the case, then I'll fight you!
In this situation, is it you who beats me or me who beats you?
Sakura is unbeatable throughout the world, winning effortlessly!
Fight you? Beat you? (pointing to himself) Me?

question: #question#What can Taro say to show he has decided to fight Sakura?

dialog.content: What, are you scared?
No, that’s not what I mean. I just think fighting is pointless. Besides, at our age, the most important thing we should be doing is studying...
(scratches head) Are you nuts?
Let's, no, let me take you to do some homework! It's never too late to change your ways!
(gives Taro a look of disbelief) Stay away from me! You've really lost it!

content.content: No, Sakura, you just haven’t experienced the joy of learning. I must take you to do some homework, you’ll definitely fall in love with studying!
Come on, let’s face this joyful world without homework together! This way we won’t get sick!
Of course, if you’re sick, you should go to the hospital, not do homework, that’s a given.
No, we’re not sick, the real illness is this world that doesn’t see people as human!

question: #question# What should Taro say to show his determination to lead Sakura in doing homework?

content.content: Then... how about we go to the live house and listen to some music? Today’s a rock special, and music can express everything!
A moment ago, I thought you were bouncing around like notes on a music sheet, and now you’re saying I’m crazy?
It might be crazy to make such a decision, but I'm sorry, I just really like you, just like Beethoven was deeply devoted to his music!
Can the world’s ailments be reflected through music? What supreme elements truly exist in the human soul?

question: #question# What should Taro say to demonstrate his appreciation for music?

dialog.content: I told you I'm not willing, and you're still trying to force your way in?
Wow! 'Force your way in,' Ying-chan, I didn't think you were so cultured!
Does your dad know you're such a pushover?
Huh?
Don't ever show your face in front of me again, or else you'll regret it!
Taro was knocked to the ground by Ying-chan once more, and Ying-chan left with flair. Taro was heartbroken, not knowing what he did wrong.
Listen, listen to music?
(Grabbing Ying-chan's hand) Yes, don't hesitate!
(At the entrance of the live house) Thank you, this is the first time someone has brought me to listen to music.
(Shyly scratching his head) It's nothing... so...
So let's leave it at that.
Huh?
We're just not meant for each other.
Ying-chan turned and walked away, leaving Taro alone at the entrance of the empty live house, watching her silhouette gradually fade away.
(Feeling excited after listening) Alright! (Strike a pose) Bring it on!
(Just before Sakura is about to hit him) Wait a minute!
What's the matter?
(Slightly trembling) Let's fight again in three days! Give me a chance to rest up!
Hahaha, fine! See you here in three days! (Turns and leaves gracefully)

content.content: (Takes out his phone and makes a call) Mr. Gua? I need a favor! ... Teach me how to fight, please! Whether I can win Sakura over depends on you!
It all comes down to these three days to prove our three-year friendship!
I can't overlook Mr. Gua's ability, so in three days, I'm sure I can beat Sakura!
Can I really beat Sakura here in three days? Do I have what it takes?

question: #question# How should Taro persuade Mr. Gua to teach him fighting skills?

content.content: Just wait, Sakura! I will defeat you with my own strength!
(Pointing to his chest) Boohoo, it really hurts here. Sakura, do you have to treat me like this?
Me, beating Sakura on my own in three days? Hahaha! No way!
I'm an independent person, no doubt about it, so Sakura is bound to fall for me.

question: #question# How should Taro express that he wants to defeat Sakura independently?

dialog.content: Of course, I will definitely help you!
Thank you so much! The bond we've built over the years isn't just talk!
(Three days later) Are you ready?
Bring it on! (shouting while charging forward)
(After several rounds, Sakura is defeated by Taro) I didn't expect you to become so strong in just three days. I... I have no choice but...
Hold up! You've still got me to deal with unless you can knock me down too!
Come on!!!!!!
Taro was struck to the ground by Peach, and Sakura's earlier acknowledgment vanished. Peach helped Sakura up from the ground and walked away briskly.
The three-day deadline is up. Are you ready?
Of course!
Hmph, then let me see what you're made of!
Take this—
Taro was knocked to the ground by Sakura, lying on his back. Sakura patted Taro on the shoulder and walked away in triumph.
(dancing gracefully to the music in his head, finishes and kneels before Sakura-chan) This dance is dedicated to you!
Wow, you dance really well!
So... would you be with me? I fell for you the moment I saw you!
Oh? If that's the case, I have one request.
Just say it, as long as I can do it, I'll fulfill anything!
I want you to be my follower!

content.content: (feeling indignant inside) How can a man like me become a woman's follower?... But she saved me, and I can't beat her... Never mind, it's just being a follower, right? I'll do it!
Sakura-chan, I'm willing to be your follower, and only your follower! I really love you!
Being a follower is such a tough job!!! I don't want to be exploited and sidelined like this!!
Follower, follower, eventually I'll become the big boss, no problem!

question: #question# How should Taro express that he follows Sakura-chan's request even if he's reluctant?

content.content: No, Sakura-chan, besides becoming... your subordinate, I have other ways to be with you!
What's a measly follower? We can totally become the leaders of the entire Tomato High School!
What's wrong with being a follower? Or being a leader? In the end, I still won't have your heart!
No, I don't want to just have that little bit of space in your heart as a follower, I want your whole heart to be full of me!

question: #question# How should Taro convey to Sakura-chan that he doesn't want to be her follower?

dialog.content: Really willing?
(deep breath) Really willing!
Then let's go, come train with me! A little brother needs to persevere and train himself, preparing for the future!
Got it! (Led by Ying, Taro begins to train, and their relationship quickly deepens)
(limping and appearing with wounds) Ying!
Peach, what happened to you?
It's those guys from Tomato High School; they... insist on challenging us. We can't just sit back and do nothing!
Absolutely not! I've recently taken in a new little brother, it's him! I believe we can succeed!

content.content: Of course, as long as we work flawlessly together, we can definitely beat them! Let's restore the reputation of Tomato High!
Yes, as the little brother, I greatly admire both of you, so please take good care of me.
Ahhhh? Am I supposed to be the one leading the charge as the little brother?
Having just one little brother and thinking that's enough to succeed? Come on, we're not that kind of impressive gang!

question: #question#How can Taro demonstrate his teamwork abilities?

content.content: Is this Peach? I've often heard Ying talk about her. If someone as impressive as her is injured like this, the opponent must be tough! I’m not going to march into danger!
Ah! I never knew the path to becoming a champion would be so arduous; I'll remain the little brother!
You know, what's the point of being the little brother? Isn't it to protect the big brother in critical moments?
Oh my god, Peach is even more impressive than Ying, I want to be Peach's little brother!

question: #question#How can Taro demonstrate his information processing abilities?

dialog.content: Great! We'll go together tomorrow!
Sure!
Let's have Peach get treated first!
(Supporting Peach) Let's go!
Tomorrow, we'll beat them so badly they'll be running for the hills!
(The next day) Hmph, one injured and one coward, and this is the team you claim will definitely defeat us?
But last time, weren't we knocked out by that Sakura?
Stop raising other people's spirits and dampening your own!
Take this!!!!!! (After a fight, Sakura is held hostage by Cat and Dog)

content.content: Oh no, how did Sakura get caught? As her sidekick, I need to protect her! If you have the guts, let Sakura go and take me hostage instead!
No, no, no, this situation is way too extreme, do they think they're in a movie? What a ridiculous mess!
Even if I replaced her as a hostage, could I really save her? How could we be so careless!
Help, how did she end up as a hostage? Isn't this dragging everyone down!!!?

question: #question# What should Taro say to show his sense of responsibility towards Sakura?

content.content: (Scooting over to Peach, whispers) Peach, don’t panic. In this situation, as long as we coordinate well, we can save Sakura!
If you have the guts, kill me and leave her alone!! Oh, not talking, huh? Then I'll kill myself!
(Kneeling, crying) What should I do? Can someone tell me what to do?! How could I possibly rescue you from them?? Why did you have to get into this fight anyway?
See the result of your overconfidence now? What was so wrong about being with me back then? And now, here you are, held hostage! Fine, let’s all be doomed together then!!!
If only I had reacted a bit faster, Sakura wouldn't be a hostage now!
Can't panic, but does teamwork really help? Will they not see through our trick?
Even the closest teams face situations like this, don't they?

question: #question# What should Taro say to show he has teamwork skills?

dialog.content: Hahaha!! You think you can??
(Looking at Taro in shock) Taro!
I warned you! Let her go now!!
No way we're letting go!!!
(Advancing step by step) I'm giving you one last countdown! Ten, nine, eight…
Taro, no!!! Fine, I admit it, I confess Tomato High School—
Taro and Peach Jam were utterly shocked by Sakura Jam's outcry. Meanwhile, A Cat and A Dog released Sakura Jam amidst their wild laughter, but Taro still hadn't reached Sakura Jam's heart.
What do you mean?
Listen to me, it's like this blablabla...
(nodding) Hmm, got it... (after discussing with Taro, the two of them start circling around Ah Cat and Ah Dog)
(facing behind Ah Cat and Ah Dog) Sakura? What are you doing there?
What?!!!
(kicks Ah Cat over while he's not paying attention)
(rescues Sakura from Ah Dog's grasp) Are you okay?!
Goodness!
(runs off with Ah Cat) We'll definitely be back!!!!
(in disbelief) You actually saved me?
It was me...
I acknowledge your strength!
Taro and Sakura embrace tightly, and Peach also joins in the hug. In the sunset glow, the scene is incredibly beautiful.
Sakura, Momo, we...
(looking at Sakura) Is this your little brother?
Aren’t you going?
It's really too dangerous, look at how Momo is already...
Hmph, I didn't see through you initially!
Momo, Sakura!!!!
Sakura helps Momo leave. The next day's duel, Taro watched secretly from the sidelines. Even though Momo and Sakura were both injured, they defeated those people from Tomato High School.
Hmph, you're not sincere at all. You won't even be my little brother, yet you say you like me?
I... it's not the same!
(injured and hobbling over) Sakura!
Peach, what happened to you? Who dared to beat you up like this?
It was those guys from Tomato High... We can't just sit back and take this! We need to make them understand—cough, cough!!
Don't get too worked up. I will definitely go! The whole of Tomato High won't tolerate them doing this!

content.content: No, you can't possibly win against them like this. Please don't go fighting, alright?
Do you really want to act so rashly? Have you thought about the outcome? Can you handle such consequences?
Your impulsiveness won't be tolerated by anyone. They won't accept you doing this, but I'm willing to accept everything about you!
What's the point of doing all this to Tomato High? They won't even remember you!

question: #question#How can Taro show he is persuading Sakura and Peach not to fight?

content.content: Peach, don't get worked up. We can take our time with these matters. What's important now is treating your wounds!
I can't tolerate your foolishness, thinking you can somehow warm a rock with your own heat!
You'll go, but will she go too? Don't bury yourself in such stupidity!
Are you idiots? Even after this, you're still going to act impulsively!

question: #question#How can Taro demonstrate his capacity for social warmth towards Peach?

dialog.content: You have no idea what we're trying to do, just back off!
Sakura, let's go! (faints after speaking)
Peach! What's wrong with you? Peach!
Look, she's already collapsed, you really shouldn't go!
Shut up!
Sakura, fed up, knocks Taro out by the roadside, helping Peach away.
None of your business!
(Struggling to support Momojam) Just go!
(Can't stand it and carries Momojam on his back) I'll take you to the hospital!
Hey, hey!!
(At the hospital entrance, leaning against the wall with Taro) Thank you so much.
No problem, it was nothing. Besides, you just helped me out too.
Let's just leave it at that; we come from different worlds.
Sakurajam hugged Taro, turned around, and walked into Momojam's exam room.
